item.title: No, I didn't watch Obama on 60 Minutes
item.description: I did not watch America’s Toxic Asset on 60 Minutes for the same reason I’ve never read “Mein Kampf.” Some people’s words do not deserve my ear. I find it interesting, though, that Mr. Obama’s 90 minute interview on a program called “60 Minutes” so eerily parallels his budget: he consumed 150 percent of what was available. To those who watched our dictator-in-the-making, I ask a question, the answer to which should demonstrate that watching the propaganda piece was useles: what did you learn that you didn’t know before?
